- [ ] Low (copy/docs fixes, small UI polish, refactor with tests, non-money routes)
- [ ] Medium (new pages, new Convex functions, multi-file feature work not touching money/auth/PII/schema/trust)
- [ ] High (payments/webhooks, auth, PII, schema changes, trust/safety enforcement)
